verses.verse: Praise <S%H1984><s%> Yah! <S%H3050><s%> Praise <S%H1984><s%> Yahweh <S%H3050><s%> from the heavens! <S%H8064><s%> Praise <S%H1984><s%> him in the heights! <S%H4791><s%>
Praise <S%H1984><s%> him, <S%H4397><s%> all his angels! Praise <S%H1984><s%> him, <S%H6635><s%> all his army!
Praise <S%H1984><s%> him, <S%H8121><s%> sun and moon! <S%H3394><s%> Praise <S%H1984><s%> him, <S%H216><s%> all you shining stars! <S%H3556><s%>
Praise <S%H1984><s%> him, <S%H8064><s%> you heavens of heavens, <S%H8064><s%> You waters <S%H4325><s%> that are above the heavens. <S%H8064><s%>
Let them praise <S%H1984><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> For he commanded, <S%H6680><s%> and they were created. <S%H1254><s%>
He has also established <S%H5975><s%> them forever <S%H5703><s%> and ever. <S%H5703><s%> He has made <S%H5414><s%> a decree <S%H2706><s%> which will not pass away. <S%H5674><s%>
Praise <S%H1984><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> from the earth, <S%H776><s%> you great sea creatures, <S%H8577><s%> and all depths! <S%H8415><s%>
Lightning <S%H784><s%> and hail, <S%H1259><s%> snow <S%H7950><s%> and clouds; <S%H7008><s%> stormy <S%H5591><s%> wind, <S%H7307><s%> fulfilling <S%H6213><s%> his word; <S%H1697><s%>
mountains <S%H2022><s%> and all hills; <S%H1389><s%> fruit <S%H6529><s%> trees <S%H6086><s%> and all cedars; <S%H730><s%>
wild animals <S%H2416><s%> and all livestock; <S%H929><s%> small creatures <S%H7431><s%> and flying <S%H3671><s%> birds; <S%H6833><s%>
kings <S%H4428><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> and all peoples; <S%H3816><s%> princes <S%H8269><s%> and all judges <S%H8199><s%> of the earth; <S%H776><s%>
both young men <S%H970><s%> and maidens; <S%H1330><s%> old men <S%H2205><s%> and children: <S%H2205><s%>

let them praise <S%H1984><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> for his name <S%H8034><s%> alone is exalted. <S%H7682><s%> His glory <S%H1935><s%> is above the earth <S%H776><s%> and the heavens. <S%H8064><s%>

He has lifted <S%H7311><s%> up the horn <S%H7161><s%> of his people, <S%H5971><s%> the praise <S%H8416><s%> of all his saints; <S%H2623><s%> even of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> a people <S%H5971><s%> near <S%H7138><s%> to him. <S%H1984><s%> Praise Yah! <S%H3050><s%>
